entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning except snow over the Highlands late in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
